f s

| 5 |  | dvafvsca.s | |- .x. = ( .s ` U ) |

| 10 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( s e. E , f e. T |-> ( s ` f ) ) = ( s e. E , f e. T |-> ( s ` f ) ) |

| 13 | 7, 12 | #P_sylan9eq | |- ( ( ( K e. V /\ W e. H ) /\ ( R e. E /\ F e. T ) ) -> ( R .x. F ) = ( R ` F ) ) |
